verses.verse: As for you, speak what is appropriate for the instruction that is healthy:
for old men to be sober, respectful, properly focused, being healthy in the trust, the love, the persistence;
for old women, similarly, to be temple-appropriate in conduct, not accusers, not having been enslaved to much wine, teachers of nice things
(so that they may properly focus the young women to be fond of their husbands, fond of children),
properly focused, consecrated, housekeepers, good, being under their own husbands so that no hurtful things may be said about the message of God;
for the younger men, similarly, encourage to be properly focused
about everything, providing yourself as an example of nice actions in the instruction: no decay, respect, nondeterioration,
a healthy message that has nothing known against it (so that the person from an opposing view might be embarrassed, having nothing useless to be saying about you);
for slaves to be placing themselves under their own owners in all things, to be very satisfying, not expressing opposition,
not secretly keeping anything for themselves, but displaying every bit of good trust so that they may decorate the instruction of our Rescuer God in all things.
You see, the generosity of God, the rescuing generosity, was shined on all people
disciplining us so that after denying the godlessness and the world desires, we might live properly focused, rightly, and godly in the present span of time
awaiting the blessed anticipation and manifestation of the magnificence of the huge God and our Rescuer Jesus, the Anointed King,
who gave Himself on our behalf so that He might pay the price to release us out of every crime and clean for Himself a special ethnic group with passion for nice actions.
Speak, encourage, and reprimand these things with every directive. No one must circumvent you.
